test_cases.name: Phishing Email with SPF/DMARC Failure
test_cases.log: Email gateway flagged message from security@vietcombank-secure.example with SPF fail, DKIM none, DMARC fail. User-facing subject requests urgent account verification in 24 hours.

test_cases.name: Phishing Variant with Lookalike Branding
test_cases.log: HTML email contains confirm-identity link to vietcombank-secure.example and image asset from cdn-vcb.example. Sender uses no-reply@vietcombank-secure.example with failed sender authentication.

test_cases.name: Benign Newsletter Control Sample
test_cases.log: Newsletter from news@vietcombank.example passes SPF, DKIM, DMARC and links to official bank security tips page.

test_cases.name: Suspicious Newly Registered Domains
test_cases.log: WHOIS for vietcombank-secure.example and vcb-alerts.example shows creation date 2026-01-10 and registrant country mismatch with bank operations. Domains observed in phishing Reply-To and URL fields.

test_cases.name: Credential Leak Mention and ATO Risk
test_cases.log: Threat monitoring note references leaked credential bundle advertised as fresh and suitable for account takeover targeting regional corporate domains.

test_cases.name: Burst of Failed Logins from Automation Clients
test_cases.log: Login telemetry shows repeated FAIL events for multiple usernames from 198.51.100.90, 198.51.100.91, and 203.0.113.200 using python-requests/2.31 and Go-http-client/1.1 within a short window.

test_cases.name: MFA Friction Followed by Single Success
test_cases.log: Account pham.d@enterprise.vn shows many FAIL results with mfa_required and invalid_password before one SUCCESS with mfa_passed from suspicious infrastructure.

test_cases.name: NFC Relay Suspicion Across Multiple Cities
test_cases.log: Card token DPAN_57ab0b46f95f1217 authorized NFC transactions in Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi, and Da Nang within about 2 minutes, all with valid cryptograms.

test_cases.name: Elevated POS NFC Duration Pattern
test_cases.log: POS NFC durations for suspicious cluster range from 1330ms to 1520ms, consistently above expected tap timing, indicating potential relay latency.

test_cases.name: Device Location Contradiction with Customer Statement
test_cases.log: Customer mobile location shows Ho Chi Minh City around 14:10-14:20 while disputed contactless transactions appear in multiple distant cities minutes later.

test_cases.name: Airport Check-In Correlated with Fraud Window
test_cases.log: Boarding pass scan at SGN at 14:15 is followed by suspicious contactless transactions beginning at 14:32, suggesting timeline overlap inconsistent with physical card presence elsewhere.

test_cases.name: Mixed Benign and Suspicious NFC Activity
test_cases.log: Dataset includes many ordinary NFC/CHIP purchases and a smaller cluster of same-token rapid multi-city NFC purchases, requiring triage separation between baseline and attack pattern.
